subject: Television
Radio
lead_paragraph: Not that Shaquille O'Neal would have much trouble landing a broadcasting gig after his N.B.A. career, but the future Hall of Fame center is going back to school to do it right.
snippet: Not that Shaquille O'Neal would have much trouble landing a broadcasting gig after his N.B.A. career, but the future Hall of Fame center is going back to school to do it right.
